title: Privacy Policy
introduction: At ExpanseHost, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when you use our services.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect several types of information to provide and improve our services:

subsections.subtitle: Personal Information
subsections.text: This includes your name, email address, billing address, phone number, and payment information when you register for an account or purchase our services.

subsections.subtitle: Technical Information
subsections.text: We automatically collect IP addresses, browser types, device information, operating system details, and access times when you use our services.

subsections.subtitle: Usage Data
subsections.text: We collect information about how you interact with our services, including pages visited, features used, and performance metrics.

subsections.subtitle: Cookies and Tracking
subsections.text: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience and analyze site usage.

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
list: To provide, maintain, and improve our hosting services
To process payments and manage billing
To communicate with you about your account, services, and support requests
To send important updates, security alerts, and administrative messages
To detect, prevent, and address technical issues and security threats
To analyze usage patterns and improve user experience
To comply with legal obligations and enforce our terms of service

sections.title: Data Storage and Security
sections.content: We take the security of your data seriously and implement industry-standard measures to protect it.

subsections.subtitle: Storage Location
subsections.text: Your data is stored on secure servers in data centers with physical and digital security measures. We use encrypted connections and secure protocols for all data transmission.

subsections.subtitle: Security Measures
subsections.text: We employ encryption, firewalls, access controls, and regular security audits to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, or destruction.

subsections.subtitle: Data Retention
subsections.text: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. Account data is retained while your account is active and for a reasonable period after closure.

sections.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
sections.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your data only in the following circumstances:
list: With service providers who help us operate our business (payment processors, hosting infrastructure providers)
When required by law, legal process, or government request
To protect our rights, property, or safety, and that of our users
In connection with a business transfer, merger, or acquisition
With your explicit consent for specific purposes

sections.title: Your Rights and Choices
sections.content: You have certain rights regarding your personal information:

subsections.subtitle: Access and Correction
subsections.text: You can access and update your account information at any time through your account dashboard or by contacting our support team.

subsections.subtitle: Data Portability
subsections.text: You have the right to request a copy of your personal data in a structured, machine-readable format.

subsections.subtitle: Deletion
subsections.text: You can request deletion of your account and personal data, subject to our legal obligations to retain certain information.

subsections.subtitle: Marketing Communications
subsections.text: You can opt out of marketing emails by clicking the unsubscribe link in any promotional email or by adjusting your account preferences.

sections.title: Cookies Policy
sections.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience on our website.

subsections.subtitle: Types of Cookies
subsections.text: We use essential cookies (required for site functionality), analytics cookies (to understand usage patterns), and preference cookies (to remember your settings).

subsections.subtitle: Managing Cookies
subsections.text: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Note that disabling certain cookies may affect site functionality.

sections.title: Third-Party Services
sections.content: Our services may integrate with or link to third-party services that have their own privacy policies. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these external services. We recommend reviewing their privacy policies before sharing your information.

sections.title: Children's Privacy
sections.content: Our services are not intended for users under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we become aware that we have collected data from a child under 13, we will take steps to delete that information.

sections.title: International Data Transfers
sections.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your data in accordance with this privacy policy.

sections.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
sections.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of significant changes by posting the new policy on our website and updating the 'Last Updated' date. Your continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us at privacy@expansehost.com or through our support ticket system.
